TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 全局设定模块
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 虚拟模块，用于设定全局参数

ParameterSettings.Name: InstructionOrder
ParameterSettings.Description: 指令排序值，为0/IncPosThenNewPos时表示加仓指令排在新建仓指令之前，为1/NewPosThenIncPos时表示新建仓指令拍在加仓指令之前

ParameterSettings.Name: IncreasePositionInstructionSortMode
ParameterSettings.Description: 加仓指令排序模式，取值为： NoSorting = 0, Randomize = 1, SortByInstructionIdAscending = 2, SortByInstructionIdDescending = 3, SortByCodeAscending = 4, SortByCodeDescending = 5, SortByVolumeAscending = 6, SortByVolumeDescending = 7, SortByMetricAscending = 8, SortByMetricDescending = 9

ParameterSettings.Name: IncreasePositionSortMetric
ParameterSettings.Description: 加仓指令排序指标，当且仅当加仓指令排序模式为8/9时有效

ParameterSettings.Name: NewPositionInstructionSortMode
ParameterSettings.Description: 新建仓指令排序模式，取值为： NoSorting = 0, Randomize = 1, SortByInstructionIdAscending = 2, SortByInstructionIdDescending = 3, SortByCodeAscending = 4, SortByCodeDescending = 5, SortByVolumeAscending = 6, SortByVolumeDescending = 7, SortByMetricAscending = 8, SortByMetricDescending = 9

ParameterSettings.Name: NewPositionSortMetric
ParameterSettings.Description: 新建仓指令排序指标，当且仅当新建仓指令排序模式为8/9时有效

ParameterSettings.Name: RandomSeeds
ParameterSettings.Description: Random seeds

ParameterSettings.Name: RandomlyRemoveInstruction
ParameterSettings.Description: Randomly remove instruction

ParameterSettings.Name: RandomlyRemoveInstructionThreshold
ParameterSettings.Description: Randomly remove instruction threshold. [0..99]

ParameterSettings.Name: CloseInstructionFirst
ParameterSettings.Description: 优先执行卖出指令以获得资金

ParameterSettings.Name: AllowEnteringMarketOnlyWhenPriceIncreasing
ParameterSettings.Description: 只允许在价格上涨时出发入市信号

ParameterSettings.Name: StopLossByClosePrice
ParameterSettings.Description: 用收盘价判断止损

ParameterSettings.Name: TrueBuyPriceScale
ParameterSettings.Description: 真实买入价比例，为0时取HighPriceScaleBeforeBuying的值

ParameterSettings.Name: HighPriceScaleBeforeBuying
ParameterSettings.Description: 买入时历史价格高点相对开盘价需达到的比例

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 板块指数指标入市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当板块指数指标和给定阈值满足触发条件时允许入市

ParameterSettings.Name: Metric
ParameterSettings.Description: 指标定义

ParameterSettings.Name: Threshold
ParameterSettings.Description: 阈值

ParameterSettings.Name: TriggeringCondition
ParameterSettings.Description: 触发条件。1表示指标值>阈值触发, 0指标值<阈值触发

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 通道突破入市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当价格突破通道后入市

ParameterSettings.Name: BreakoutWindow
ParameterSettings.Description: 通道突破窗口

ParameterSettings.Name: PriceSelector
ParameterSettings.Description: 价格选择选项。0为最高价，1为最低价，2为收盘价，3为开盘价

ParameterSettings.Name: BreakoutDirection
ParameterSettings.Description: 突破方向。0为低位突破，1为高位突破

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: CRSI入市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当CRSI和阈值满足触发条件时允许入市

ParameterSettings.Name: RsiPeriod
ParameterSettings.Description: RSI周期

ParameterSettings.Name: CrsiPeriod
ParameterSettings.Description: Cumulative RSI周期

ParameterSettings.Name: Threshold
ParameterSettings.Description: Cumulative RSI阈值

ParameterSettings.Name: TriggeringCondition
ParameterSettings.Description: 触发条件。1表示Cumulative RSI高于Threshold触发，0表示Cumulative RSI低于Threshold触发

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: DMI入市过滤器
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当ADX处于上升并且超过AdxThreshold时允许入市

ParameterSettings.Name: DmiWindowSize
ParameterSettings.Description: DMI周期

ParameterSettings.Name: AdxThreshold
ParameterSettings.Description: ADX阈值

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: EfficiencyRatio入市过滤器
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当EfficiencyRatio超过ErThreshold时允许入市

ParameterSettings.Name: ErWindowSize
ParameterSettings.Description: EfficiencyRatio周期

ParameterSettings.Name: ErThreshold
ParameterSettings.Description: EfficiencyRatio阈值

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 跳空后反弹入市策略
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当收盘价低于移动平均一定程度，并且开盘跳空，收盘超过昨日收盘后入市

ParameterSettings.Name: MovingAveragePeriod
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均趋势线周期, 0表示忽略

ParameterSettings.Name: MinPercentageBelowMovingAverage
ParameterSettings.Description: 收盘价应当比移动平均低的最小百分比例

ParameterSettings.Name: MinPercentageOfGapDown
ParameterSettings.Description: 跳空开盘价低于昨日最低价的最小百分比

ParameterSettings.Name: MinBouncePercentageOverLastLowestPrice
ParameterSettings.Description: 反弹超过昨日最低价的最小百分比

ParameterSettings.Name: MaxUpShadowPercentage
ParameterSettings.Description: 上影线所允许的最大比例

ParameterSettings.Name: MaxDownShadowPercentage
ParameterSettings.Description: 下影线所允许的最大比例

ParameterSettings.Name: MinPeriodForBeingLowestPrice
ParameterSettings.Description: 反弹日最低价满足为最近若干周期内的最低价条件中的最小周期数, 0表示忽略此条件

ParameterSettings.Name: AllowTwoDaysBounce
ParameterSettings.Description: 允许两日反弹

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 跳空后盘中反弹过昨日最低点入市策略
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当昨日收盘价低于移动平均一定程度并且今日开盘跳空后盘中昨日收盘后以昨日收盘价入市

ParameterSettings.Name: MovingAveragePeriod
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均趋势线周期, 0表示忽略

ParameterSettings.Name: MinPercentageBelowMovingAverage
ParameterSettings.Description: 昨日收盘价应当比移动平均低的最小百分比例

ParameterSettings.Name: MinPercentageOfGapDown
ParameterSettings.Description: 跳空开盘价低于昨日最低价的最小百分比

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 移动平均交叉入市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当短期平均向上交叉长期平均时入市

ParameterSettings.Name: Short
ParameterSettings.Description: 短期移动平均周期

ParameterSettings.Name: Long
ParameterSettings.Description: 长期移动平均周期

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 移动平均趋势入市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当各个周期的移动平均值按照周期大小逆序排列时（即图形上小周期的均值在上，大周期均值在下）允许入市

ParameterSettings.Name: Period1
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均周期1, 0 表示忽略

ParameterSettings.Name: Period2
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均周期2, 0 表示忽略

ParameterSettings.Name: Period3
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均周期3, 0 表示忽略

ParameterSettings.Name: Period4
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均周期4, 0 表示忽略

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 价格和成交量变化入市过滤器
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当天价格相对上日上涨超过一定比例，成交量超过之前一段时间平均成交量一定比例，且上影线没有超过一定比例则允许入市，否则将不允许入市。

ParameterSettings.Name: MinPriceChangePercentage
ParameterSettings.Description: 当日价格相对上日收盘价变化的最小幅度百分比

ParameterSettings.Name: MaxPriceChangePercentage
ParameterSettings.Description: 当日价格相对上日收盘价变化的最大幅度百分比

ParameterSettings.Name: MinVolumeChangePercentage
ParameterSettings.Description: 当日成交量超过之前一段时间平均成交量的最小幅度百分比

ParameterSettings.Name: MaxVolumeChangePercentage
ParameterSettings.Description: 当日成交量超过之前一段时间平均成交量的最大幅度百分比

ParameterSettings.Name: VolumeLookbackWindow
ParameterSettings.Description: 平均成交量回看窗口

ParameterSettings.Name: MaxPercentageOfUpShadow
ParameterSettings.Description: 上影线最大百分比例

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 原始指标入市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当指标值和阈值满足触发条件时允许入市

ParameterSettings.Name: RawMetric
ParameterSettings.Description: 原始指标

ParameterSettings.Name: HighThreshold
ParameterSettings.Description: 上阈值

ParameterSettings.Name: LowThreshold
ParameterSettings.Description: 下阈值

ParameterSettings.Name: TriggeringCondition
ParameterSettings.Description: 触发条件。1表示指标值在上下阈值之间(含)触发, 0表示指标值在上下阈值之外触发

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: RSI入市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当RSI和阈值满足触发条件时允许入市

ParameterSettings.Name: RsiPeriod
ParameterSettings.Description: RSI周期

ParameterSettings.Name: Threshold
ParameterSettings.Description: RSI阈值

ParameterSettings.Name: TriggeringCondition
ParameterSettings.Description: 触发条件。1表示RSI高于Threshold触发，0表示RSI低于Threshold触发

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 单移动平均板块指数入市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当板块指数收盘价和移动平均值满足触发条件时允许入市

ParameterSettings.Name: MovingAverageMetricName
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均指标名

ParameterSettings.Name: MovingAveragePeriod
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均周期

ParameterSettings.Name: Argument1
ParameterSettings.Description: 参数1, 小于0将被忽略

ParameterSettings.Name: Argument2
ParameterSettings.Description: 参数2, 小于0将被忽略

ParameterSettings.Name: TriggeringCondition
ParameterSettings.Description: 触发条件。1表示收盘价高于移动平均值触发, 0表示收盘价低于移动平均值触发

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 单移动平均入市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当收盘价和移动平均值满足触发条件时允许入市

ParameterSettings.Name: MovingAverageMetricName
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均指标名

ParameterSettings.Name: MovingAveragePeriod
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均周期

ParameterSettings.Name: Argument1
ParameterSettings.Description: 参数1, 小于0将被忽略

ParameterSettings.Name: Argument2
ParameterSettings.Description: 参数2, 小于0将被忽略

ParameterSettings.Name: TriggeringCondition
ParameterSettings.Description: 触发条件。1表示收盘价高于移动平均值触发, 0表示收盘价低于移动平均值触发

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: TRIN指标入市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当TRIN指标连续高于或者低于阈值后入市

ParameterSettings.Name: TrinWindow
ParameterSettings.Description: TRIN窗口

ParameterSettings.Name: ConsecutivePeriods
ParameterSettings.Description: 连续统计周期数

ParameterSettings.Name: Threshold
ParameterSettings.Description: 阈值

ParameterSettings.Name: TriggeringCondition
ParameterSettings.Description: 触发条件，1表示高于阈值， 0 表示低于阈值

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: Weekday入市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当交易日期是指定的weekday入市

ParameterSettings.Name: WeekdayMask
ParameterSettings.Description: 允许交易日期的掩码，最低7位分别代表星期日到星期六是否允许入市。当掩码位为1时可入市

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: ATR标准差跟踪停价退市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当价格向有利方向变动时，持续跟踪设置止损价为当前价格减去ATR的标准差*ATR标准差停价倍数

ParameterSettings.Name: AtrWindowSize
ParameterSettings.Description: ATR计算窗口大小

ParameterSettings.Name: AtrDevStopLossFactor
ParameterSettings.Description: ATR标准差停价倍数

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: ATR跟踪停价退市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当价格向有利方向变动时，持续跟踪设置止损价为当前价格减去ATR乘以Atr停价倍数

ParameterSettings.Name: AtrWindowSize
ParameterSettings.Description: ATR计算窗口大小

ParameterSettings.Name: AtrStopLossFactor
ParameterSettings.Description: ATR停价倍数

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 通道突破退市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当价格突破通道后退市

ParameterSettings.Name: BreakoutWindow
ParameterSettings.Description: 通道突破窗口

ParameterSettings.Name: PriceSelector
ParameterSettings.Description: 价格选择选项。0为最高价，1为最低价，2为收盘价，3为开盘价

ParameterSettings.Name: BreakoutDirection
ParameterSettings.Description: 突破方向。0为低位突破，1为高位突破

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: CRSI退市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当CRSI和阈值满足触发条件时退市

ParameterSettings.Name: RsiPeriod
ParameterSettings.Description: RSI周期

ParameterSettings.Name: CrsiPeriod
ParameterSettings.Description: Cumulative RSI周期

ParameterSettings.Name: Threshold
ParameterSettings.Description: Cumulative RSI阈值

ParameterSettings.Name: TriggeringCondition
ParameterSettings.Description: 触发条件。1表示Cumulative RSI高于Threshold触发，0表示Cumulative RSI低于Threshold触发

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 首次获利退出
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当头寸持有首次获利后退出市场

ParameterSettings.Name: PriceSelector
ParameterSettings.Description: 价格选择选项。0为最高价，1为最低价，2为收盘价，3为开盘价

ParameterSettings.Name: MinKeepPeriods
ParameterSettings.Description: 最小保持周期数

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 第一天亏损退出
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当头寸持有第一天就亏损则退出市场

ParameterSettings.Name: MinLossPercentage
ParameterSettings.Description: 最小亏损百分比, 当亏损大于此值时退出

ParameterSettings.Name: MinLossPercentageToPreviousDayClose
ParameterSettings.Description: 相对前一日收盘亏损百分比, 当亏损大于此值时退出

ParameterSettings.Name: ExitingPeriod
ParameterSettings.Description: 退出周期。0/CurrentPeriod为本周期, 1/NextPeriod为下周期

ParameterSettings.Name: ExitingPriceOption
ParameterSettings.Description: 退出价格选项。 OpenPrice = 0, ClosePrice = 1, CustomPrice = 2

ParameterSettings.Name: ExitingCustomPrice
ParameterSettings.Description: 退出价格，当ExitingPriceOption = 2/CustomPrice时有效

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 第一天亏损跟踪止损退出
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当头寸持有第一天就亏损则设置止损退出市场

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 移动平均交叉退市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当短期平均向下交叉长期平均时退市

ParameterSettings.Name: Short
ParameterSettings.Description: 短期移动平均周期

ParameterSettings.Name: Long
ParameterSettings.Description: 长期移动平均周期

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 移动平均趋势退市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当各个周期的移动平均值不按照周期大小逆序排列时（即图形上小周期的均值在上，大周期均值在下）退市

ParameterSettings.Name: Period1
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均周期1, 0 表示忽略

ParameterSettings.Name: Period2
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均周期2, 0 表示忽略

ParameterSettings.Name: Period3
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均周期3, 0 表示忽略

ParameterSettings.Name: Period4
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均周期4, 0 表示忽略

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 从不退市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 从不退市，依赖于初始止损或者其他模块退市

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 限期未盈利退出
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当头寸持有超过一段时间后若没有获得足够利润则退出市场

ParameterSettings.Name: HoldingPeriods
ParameterSettings.Description: 头寸持有周期数。多个周期用','分割

ParameterSettings.Name: ExpectedProfitPercentage
ParameterSettings.Description: 期待盈利百分比

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 百分比折回跟踪停价退市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 如果当前价格低于最高价的一定百分比则触发停价退市

ParameterSettings.Name: MaxPercentageOfDrawDown
ParameterSettings.Description: 从最高点回撤的最大百分比

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 利润折回跟踪停价退市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当利润超过一定程度后，从最高点损失一定百分比则触发停价退市

ParameterSettings.Name: MaxPercentageOfProfitDrawdownString
ParameterSettings.Description: 利润折回参数串。参数由冒号（:）分割的浮点数构成。按照顺序这些数代表利润为0到N个R（初始风险）时允许利润折回的最大百分比。连续的冒号表示值与前一个相同。

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 原始指标跟踪停价
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 以原始指标的值跟踪停价

ParameterSettings.Name: RawMetric
ParameterSettings.Description: 原始指标

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: RSI退市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当RSI和阈值满足触发条件时退市

ParameterSettings.Name: RsiPeriod
ParameterSettings.Description: RSI周期

ParameterSettings.Name: Threshold
ParameterSettings.Description: RSI阈值

ParameterSettings.Name: TriggeringCondition
ParameterSettings.Description: 触发条件。1表示RSI高于Threshold触发，0表示RSI低于Threshold触发

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 第二天亏损退出
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当头寸持有第二天就亏损则退出市场

ParameterSettings.Name: MinLossPercentage
ParameterSettings.Description: 最小亏损百分比, 当亏损大于此值时退出

ParameterSettings.Name: MinLossPercentageOpenToFirstDayMin
ParameterSettings.Description: 第二天开盘相对第一天开盘收盘小者的最小亏损百分比, 当亏损大于此值时退出

ParameterSettings.Name: MinLossPercentageCloseToFirstDayMin
ParameterSettings.Description: 第二天收盘相对第一天开盘收盘小者的最小亏损百分比, 当亏损大于此值时退出

ParameterSettings.Name: ExitingPeriod
ParameterSettings.Description: 退出周期。0/CurrentPeriod为本周期，1/NextPeriod为下周期

ParameterSettings.Name: ExitingPriceOption
ParameterSettings.Description: 退出价格选项。 OpenPrice = 0, ClosePrice = 1, CustomPrice = 2

ParameterSettings.Name: ExitingCustomPrice
ParameterSettings.Description: 退出价格, 当ExitingPriceOption = 2/CustomPrice时有效

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 单移动平均退市
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当收盘价和移动平均值满足触发条件时退市

ParameterSettings.Name: MovingAverageMetricName
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均指标名

ParameterSettings.Name: MovingAveragePeriod
ParameterSettings.Description: 移动平均周期

ParameterSettings.Name: Argument1
ParameterSettings.Description: 参数1, 小于0将被忽略

ParameterSettings.Name: Argument2
ParameterSettings.Description: 参数2, 小于0将被忽略

ParameterSettings.Name: TriggeringCondition
ParameterSettings.Description: 触发条件。1表示收盘价高于移动平均值触发, 0表示收盘价低于移动平均值触发

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 第三天开盘条件退出
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当头寸持有第三天开盘符合条件就退出市场

ParameterSettings.Name: MinLossPercentageOpenToFirstDayMin
ParameterSettings.Description: 第三天开盘相对第一天开盘收盘小者的最小亏损百分比, 当亏损大于此值时退出

ParameterSettings.Name: MinLossPercentageOpenToSecondDayMin
ParameterSettings.Description: 第三天开盘相对第二天开盘收盘小者的最小亏损百分比, 当亏损大于此值时退出

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 定时后出现首次下降退出
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当头寸持有超过一段时间后，并且开盘价未跳空高开，或者收阴线，或者收盘价出现首次下降立即退出市场

ParameterSettings.Name: HoldingPeriods
ParameterSettings.Description: 头寸持有周期数

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 定时退出
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当头寸持有超过一段时间后立即退出市场

ParameterSettings.Name: HoldingPeriods
ParameterSettings.Description: 头寸持有周期数

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: ATR标准差停价
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当价格低于买入价，并且差值>ATR的标准差*ATR标准差停价倍数时停价

ParameterSettings.Name: AtrWindowSize
ParameterSettings.Description: ATR计算窗口大小

ParameterSettings.Name: AtrDevStopLossFactor
ParameterSettings.Description: ATR标准差停价倍数

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: ATR停价
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当价格低于买入价，并且差值大于ATR乘以Atr停价倍数时停价

ParameterSettings.Name: AtrWindowSize
ParameterSettings.Description: ATR计算窗口大小

ParameterSettings.Name: AtrStopLossFactor
ParameterSettings.Description: ATR停价倍数

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 百分比折回停价
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 如果当前价格低于买入价的一定百分比则触发停价

ParameterSettings.Name: MaxPercentageOfLoss
ParameterSettings.Description: 最大损失的百分比

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 原始指标停价
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 以原始指标的值作为停价

ParameterSettings.Name: RawMetric
ParameterSettings.Description: 原始指标

ParameterSettings.Name: RawMetricScale
ParameterSettings.Description: 原始指标比例尺

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 价格等值模型
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 每份头寸占有的价值是总权益的固定比例(1/PartsOfEquity)

ParameterSettings.Name: PartsOfEquity
ParameterSettings.Description: 权益被分割的块数，每份头寸将占有一份. 0表示自适应划分

ParameterSettings.Name: MaxPartsOfAdpativeAllocation
ParameterSettings.Description: 自适应划分中所允许的最大划分数目, 0表示和MinPartsOfAdpativeAllocation保持一致

ParameterSettings.Name: MinPartsOfAdpativeAllocation
ParameterSettings.Description: 自适应划分中所允许的最小划分数目

ParameterSettings.Name: MaxObjectNumberToBeEstimated
ParameterSettings.Description: 最大待处理头寸数目，当待处理头寸数目超过此数时不买入任何头寸

ParameterSettings.Name: EquityEvaluationMethod
ParameterSettings.Description: 权益计算方法。0：核心权益法，1：总权益法，2：抵减总权益法，3：初始权益法，4：控制损失初始权益法，5：控制损失总权益法，6：控制损失抵减总权益法

ParameterSettings.Name: EquityUtilization
ParameterSettings.Description: 权益利用率，[0.0..1.0], 0.0代表恒定权益利用率为1.0

ParameterSettings.Name: LimitNewPositionCountAsParts
ParameterSettings.Description: 限制新头寸数目不超过划分数目

ParameterSettings.Name: LogarithmBase
ParameterSettings.Description: 对数底, 用于计算权益使用率, 0.0表示不使用

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 风险百分比模型
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 每份头寸的风险是总权益的固定比例(PecentageOfEquityForEachRisk / 100.0)

ParameterSettings.Name: PercentageOfEquityForEachRisk
ParameterSettings.Description: 每份头寸的风险占权益的百分比

ParameterSettings.Name: EquityEvaluationMethod
ParameterSettings.Description: 权益计算方法。0：核心权益法，1：总权益法，2：抵减总权益法，3：初始权益法，4：控制损失初始权益法，5：控制损失总权益法，6：控制损失抵减总权益法

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 波动率百分比模型
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 每份头寸的波动率是总权益的固定比例(PecentageOfEquityForEachPositionVolatility / 100.0)

ParameterSettings.Name: VolatilityWindowSize
ParameterSettings.Description: 波动率计算时间窗口大小

ParameterSettings.Name: PercentageOfEquityForEachPositionVolatility
ParameterSettings.Description: 每份头寸的波动率占权益的百分比

ParameterSettings.Name: EquityEvaluationMethod
ParameterSettings.Description: 权益计算方法。0：核心权益法，1：总权益法，2：抵减总权益法，3：初始权益法，4：控制损失初始权益法，5：控制损失总权益法，6：控制损失抵减总权益法

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 跳空反弹头寸调整策略
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 当首日收小幅阴线时按收盘价买入

ParameterSettings.Name: MaxDropPercentage
ParameterSettings.Description: 最大收盘下跌百分比，当下跌比例超过时不允许买入

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 通用头寸调整策略
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 按照参数规定当盈利达到一定程度就加仓，直到最大仓位。

ParameterSettings.Name: MaxPositionCountOfEachObject
ParameterSettings.Description: 单交易对象最大允许的头寸个数（非总头寸数）

ParameterSettings.Name: RiskPercentageTrigger
ParameterSettings.Description: 加仓规则，由浮点数表示. 每当一个交易对象的最后一个头寸获利超过此头寸的初始风险*RiskPercentageTrigger/100, 则添加一个新头寸

ParameterSettings.Name: AddPositionInUpTrendOnly
ParameterSettings.Description: 只在上升趋势加仓标志

ParameterSettings.Name: MaxIntervalInDaysBetweenTwoPositions
ParameterSettings.Description: 两个头寸所允许的最大间隔（按日计）， 0表示没有限制

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 通用买入价过滤器
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 通用买入价过滤，只接受价格在给定指标值的一定上下范围内活动

ParameterSettings.Name: RawMetric
ParameterSettings.Description: 参考指标

ParameterSettings.Name: PriceUpLimitPercentage
ParameterSettings.Description: 价格上限百分比

ParameterSettings.Name: PriceDownLimitPercentage
ParameterSettings.Description: 价格下限百分比

ParameterSettings.Name: IsUpLimitPriceAcceptable
ParameterSettings.Description: 是否允许价格超过上限后按上限价格买入

TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Name: 跳空反弹策略专用买入价过滤器
TradingStrategyComponentSettings.Description: 跳空反弹策略专用买入价过滤器, 要求买入价不低于给定下限，并且在之前价格区间[Lo..Cl]的位置符合要求

ParameterSettings.Name: BuyPriceDownLimitProportion
ParameterSettings.Description: 买入价格下限比例Prop，具体下限值由前一个Bar的Low * (1.0 - prop) + Open * prop计算得出. Prop应当在[0..1]内
